plot: A spoken-word poet, Paul Tran, excavates the violence, horror and racial capitalism beneath the beauty industry of post-Vietnam-War-America through the lens of Vietnamese nail salon workers.
title: #1 Beauty Nail Salon
plot_es: A spoken-word poet, Paul Tran, excavates the violence, horror and racial capitalism beneath the beauty industry of post-Vietnam-War-America through the lens of Vietnamese nail salon workers.
plot_en: A spoken-word poet, Paul Tran, excavates the violence, horror and racial capitalism beneath the beauty industry of post-Vietnam-War-America through the lens of Vietnamese nail salon workers.
